    <style>
      #loader {
        position: fixed;
        inset: 0;
        z-index: 9999;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        background-color: #f9fafb;
        transition: opacity 0.3s ease-out;
      }

      @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
        #loader {
          background-color: #111827;
        }
        #loader .logo-text {
          color: #fff;
        }
        #loader .face-bg {
          fill: rgba(79, 70, 229, 0.3);
        }
        #loader .face-glow {
          fill: rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.2);
        }
        #loader .face-stroke {
          stroke: #818cf8;
        }
      }

      #loader.fade-out {
        opacity: 0;
      }

      #loader .logo-container {
        text-align: center;
      }

      #loader .logo-svg {
        width: 72px;
        height: 72px;
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
      }

      #loader .logo-text {
        font-family: 'Quattrocento', serif;
        font-weight: 700;
        font-size: 1.5rem;
        color: #111827;
        letter-spacing: -0.02em;
      }

      #loader .face-bg {
        fill: rgba(224, 231, 255, 0.6);
        animation: pulse 2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.6, 1) infinite;
      }

      #loader .face-glow {
        fill: rgba(199, 210, 254, 0.8);
        animation: pulse 2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.6, 1) infinite;
        animation-delay: 0.5s;
      }

      #loader .face-stroke {
        stroke: #6366f1;
        stroke-width: 12;
        stroke-linecap: round;
      }

      #loader .face-eye {
        animation: blink 4s ease-in-out infinite;
      }

      #loader .face-smile {
        animation: smile 4s ease-in-out infinite;
      }

      #loader .particle {
        fill: #6366f1;
        animation: float 3s ease-in-out infinite;
      }

      #loader .particle:nth-child(2) {
        animation-delay: 0.5s;
      }

      #loader .particle:nth-child(3) {
        animation-delay: 1s;
      }

      @keyframes pulse {
        0%, 100% {
          opacity: 1;
        }
        50% {
          opacity: 0.8;
        }
      }

      @keyframes blink {
        0%, 100% {
          d: path('M150 160 Q160 180 170 160');
        }
        50% {
          d: path('M150 170 Q160 170 170 170');
        }
      }

      @keyframes smile {
        0%, 100% {
          d: path('M150 240 Q200 280 250 240');
        }
        50% {
          d: path('M150 250 Q200 290 250 250');
        }
      }

      @keyframes float {
        0%, 100% {
          transform: translateY(0);
        }
        50% {
          transform: translateY(-10px);
        }
      }
    </style>

  <body>
    <div id="loader">
      <div class="logo-container">
        <svg class="logo-svg" viewBox="0 0 400 400" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
          <!-- Background circle -->
          <circle cx="200" cy="200" r="180" class="face-bg">
            <animate attributeName="r" values="175;185;175" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
          </circle>

          <!-- Glow effect -->
          <circle cx="200" cy="200" r="190" class="face-glow" opacity="0.5">
            <animate attributeName="r" values="185;195;185" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
          </circle>

          <!-- Face -->
          <g class="face-stroke">
            <!-- Left eye -->
            <path d="M150 160 Q160 180 170 160" class="face-eye">
              <animate attributeName="d" values="M150 160 Q160 180 170 160;M150 170 Q160 170 170 170;M150 160 Q160 180 170 160" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
            </path>

            <!-- Right eye -->
            <path d="M230 160 Q240 180 250 160" class="face-eye">
              <animate attributeName="d" values="M230 160 Q240 180 250 160;M230 170 Q240 170 250 170;M230 160 Q240 180 250 160" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
            </path>

            <!-- Smile -->
            <path d="M150 240 Q200 280 250 240" class="face-smile">
              <animate attributeName="d" values="M150 240 Q200 280 250 240;M150 250 Q200 290 250 250;M150 240 Q200 280 250 240" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
            </path>
          </g>

          <!-- Floating particles -->
          <g>
            <circle cx="120" cy="150" r="4" class="particle">
              <animate attributeName="cy" values="150;140;150" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
            </circle>
            <circle cx="280" cy="150" r="4" class="particle">
              <animate attributeName="cy" values="150;160;150" dur="2.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
            </circle>
            <circle cx="200" cy="100" r="4" class="particle">
              <animate attributeName="cy" values="100;90;100" dur="3.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
            </circle>
          </g>
        </svg>
        <div class="logo-text">myserenify</div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div id="root"></div>
    <script>
      // Remove loader once React is mounted
      window.addEventListener('load', () => {
        const loader = document.getElementById('loader');
        if (loader) {
          loader.classList.add('fade-out');
          setTimeout(() => {
            loader.remove();
          }, 300);
        }
      });
    </script>
  </body>
